DOC.brief_summary: Randomized clinical trial compare water therapy plus low-salt diet water therapy alone patient affect idiopathic calcium nephrolithiasis . Treatment duration : three month Primary end-point : correction hypercalciuria Main inclusion criterion : calcium stone former idiopathic hypercalciuria , least one stone expel analyze infrared spectrophotometry ; presence hypercalciuria ( > 300 mg/day male > 200 mg/day female ) ; 18-65 year . Main exclusion criterion : primary hyperparathyroidism , primary hyperoxaluria , enteric hyperoxaluria , bowel resection , inflammatory bowel disease , renal tubular acidosis , sarcoidosis , sponge kidney , hyperthyroidism , use hypercalciuric drug Vitamin D , acetazolamide , anti-epileptic drug
